query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_employees,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ativos,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inativos
FROM employees
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_employees,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ativos,
  SUM(CASE WHEN active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inativos
FROM employees
